message.content:
cs.NI, cs.GT, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.DS 

This paper is primarily focused on fog computing and its application in IoT systems, which falls under the category of computer networks (cs.NI). The paper also uses game theory to model the competition between IoT users for fog computing resources, which falls under the category of game theory and economics (cs.GT). Additionally, the paper discusses the allocation of computing resources in a hierarchical computing paradigm, which could be classified under distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC). The paper also proposes a resource allocation mechanism, which involves optimization and algorithm design, falling under the category of control systems (cs.SY) and data structures and algorithms (cs.DS).
